Articles.Content: So, I've reached enough posts to have my postings permissions turned on, but one seems to still be off, and it's "you cannot post attachments." I believe you need this on to share spacecraft files and such, so how can this be turned on?

Attachments have been disabled because of a security issue. For posting ship files, link to a file-sharing service like Mediafire or Dropbox, and for pics, Imgur or one of the others.

Meanwhile, welcome to the forum.
OK, thanks for that info! Although it's a shame that it's not available. It would make things like posting ship files and pictures much easier.
Welcome aboard! I hope you enjoy the forums. Also, I'm looking forward to your crafts, if you post them.
